content: medusa materials size g and h hook ww yarn i used dark pink red heart and black simply soft 2 buttons for the eyes needle and embroidery floss fiberfill jingle bells optional body 6 single_crochet in ring rd1 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 12 single_crochet rd2 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next around 18 single_crochet rd3 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 single_crochet rd4 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd5 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd6-rd10 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 30 single_crochet rd11 decrease 1 single_crochet in first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd12 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 24 single_crochet rd13 decrease 1 single_crochet in first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet around 18 single_crochet rd14 decrease 1 single_crochet in first 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet around 12 single_crochet round 15 decrease 1 single_crochet around 6 single_crochet chain 1 3 single_crochet across turn row 1 chain 5 3 treble_crochet in same space 4 treble_crochet in each single_crochet across 11 treble_crochet - the chain 5 counts as the first treble_crochet row 2 change color chain 1 single_crochet in each treble_crochet across 12 single_crochet row 3 chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet chain 21 2 single_crochet in each chain down single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat the process across finish off weave in ends note i sewed on the buttons and used the black yarn to stitch a smile on her after the 30 single_crochet rounds and i stuffed her with fiberfil and a couple jingle bells in one of the decrease rounds have fun pattern written by gnathalie2
